content:
Some highlights:
I go by Kuesto Evergrind online, or kuesto for short. I do not go by Kuesto Evergrind IRL, nor kuesto for short. I stole this name from my High Elf Enchanter in EverQuest. I work professionally as a web dev. I try to avoid it as much as I can outside of work. I am a hobbyist gamedev. Right now Iâ€™m working on a CRPG/Roguelike hybrid I call RGFQ I am a hobbyist gamer. Favorites include Ultima, Gothic and any game by Spiderweb Software. I am a hobbyist angler. Mostly freshwater on public reservoirs. I have a soft spot for historical fiction novels. I might live somewhere in Texas.
title: Who am I?

content:
Itâ€™s anything I want it to be. But how was it made? Hereâ€™s some highlights:
Built with Hugo. The theme is based on Hugo Relearn Theme. The colorscheme is NA16 Palette. The title/header font is Go Mono. Everything else is Agave. Hosted on Github Pages.
